item.title: Matter Is Finally Ready to Deliver the Smart Home It Promised
item.description: After a turbulent beginning, smart home standard Matter feels like it’s growing up. And with big-name supporters like Google, Apple—and Ikea—behind it, a simpler smart home feels finally within reach.
